events.description: Events planned all through the New Year and into January and February.
Event featuring the return of Pink Rathian and Black Diablos, event-exclusive equipment, and quests rewarding lots of Zenny.

Zinogre will be the guaranteed fifth monster in all Hunt-a-thons. Completing exclusive Event Quests during this time will reward you with a new Hunter Medal. Zinogre will still appear in Hunt-a-thons after December 17, but at its usual rate.

Major update introducing two new weapon types (Dual Blades and Lances), four new large monsters (Radobaan, Banbaro, Barioth, and Zinogre), a new sleep element, and a new hunting experience called Hunt-a-thons. The habitats have been updated with a winter theme and two new small monsters (Wulg and Cortos) have been added. New hunting experience where some gathering points turn into Hunt-a-thon Points, allowing you to hunt five large monsters in succession. Large monsters that you encounter in Hunt-a-thons are stronger than those that usually appear in the field.
A limited-time in-game event to celebrate Monster Hunter Now's nomination for Best Mobile Game at The Game Awards. More details to be announced.

Qualily has been busy continuing her investigation into the anomalies and she needs your help again! She’s back with more investigation requests for you—10 of them in total. Can she count on you to help slay monsters and investigate gathering points? Rewards this time will include Carpenterbugs, Monster Bone+, and other materials such as Dragonite Ore! Ready your equipment and prepare to investigate!

events.summary: Fulminations in the Frost, Hunt-a-thons & Winter Monster Hunt
events.description: Major update introducing new monsters, weapon types, and Hunt-a-thons. The field will be lightly snow-covered to match the monsters that will be appearing. New way to play in which multiple monsters can be hunted in succession. Zinogre will be exclusive to Hunt-a-thons. Barioth, Wulg, and Cortos will only be around while there is snow on the field and they will stop appearing with the arrival of spring.

events.summary: Diablos and Black Diablos Appearance Boost & Time-limited Event Quests
events.description: Diablos and Black Diablos appearance rates will be boosted. Monsters in all habitats will reappear in shorter intervals than usual. Time-limited Event Quests will be added. Complete these quests to receive the Roars of the Desert Medal.

events.summary: Roar of the Desert: Diablos & Black Diablos Appearance
events.description: Increase in Diablos activity in desert habitats with reported sightings of Black Diablos. Exclusive Packs with Special Carving Knives will be available to aid in hunts. Hunters can add a Hunter Medal to their collection by completing weekend-exclusive Event Quests. Black Diablos will appear in low numbers in desert habitats.
